entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 02:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 02:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 02:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
